com.ibm.team.process.common.advice.runtime
Interface IParticipantInfoCollector

All Superinterfaces:
IReportInfoCollector
public interface IParticipantInfoCollector
extends IReportInfoCollector

Report info collector which can create new infos for an operation participant.

Since:
0.6
See Also:

Method Detail

createInfo

IReportInfo createInfo(java.lang.String summary,
                       java.lang.String description)
Convenience method which creates a new participant info with a severity of IProcessReport.OK. Implementors may use this method for reporting successful steps taken by this participant.

The returned info has not yet been added to this collector. Clients are responsible for adding the info to this collector after they have made any desired modifications to it.

Infos may be created with a custom type identifiers for use by clients. For example, clients may provide specific UI presentations for infos based on their type.

Parameters:
summary - the info summary
description - the info description
type - the info type or null
Returns:
a new participant info with the given attributes

createExceptionInfo

IReportInfo createExceptionInfo(java.lang.String summary,
                                java.lang.Throwable exception)
Convenience method which creates an info for the given runtime exception which occurred while running this participant.

The returned info has not yet been added to this collector. Clients are responsible for adding the info to this collector after they have made any desired modifications to it.

Note that this method is intended for exceptions which occurred during processing. It is not intended for reporting problems detected by a participant. The method #createInfo(String, String, String) should be used for reporting such problems instead.

Parameters:
summary - the info summary
exception - the runtime exception which occurred during processing
Returns:
a new participant info which reports an exception
